column4: does anyone here have experience with thunderbird? I'm not sure if it is Ubuntu's problem or Thunderbird's ... but at the thunderbird-channel on mozilla I don't get any answer ...
Thunderbird seems to work fine for me. What is the actual issue
my specific problem is an error with the webmail-extension ... It just returns that it couldn't connect to the server at localhost, because the connection was refused
any idea about this localhost-problem with the webmail-extension?
